value.car: Car/motorbike: Free parking on the entire Klosterweg

catering.title: Catering
catering.value: Food and drink will be supplied! There will be barbecue food (vegan/vegetarian/meat), salads, cakes, alcoholic and non-alcoholic cocktails and draught beer.

0.title: What can I bring along?
0.value: You are very welcome to bring food. Barbecues, salads and cakes are very welcome. Everything is available in terms of drinks. If you have an interesting game or something similar, you are also welcome to bring it along!

1.title: What can I gift you?
1.value: Your presence is the greatest gift! If you still want to give a gift, I would be happy about a donation for the drinks and food. Of course, I am still happy to receive creative gifts :D

2.title: Is it possible to stay overnight?
2.value: Unfortunately, there are only very limited places to sleep and only for people outside Karlsruhe. If you need a place to sleep, please let me know when you register and join the Bettbörse.

3.title: Can I offer a bed for the night?
3.value: As long as you live within Karlsruhe, this is possible. Please indicate this when you register and join the Bettbörse.

4.title: Is there a place where you can plan to travel together by car?
4.value: Yes, there is a group for this where you can exchange ideas: Carpooling

5.title: How does the team battle work?
5.value: Each guest receives a team membership (red/blue) and 5 tokens when registering. These can be bet for various games. The more tokens a team has in proportion to the opposing team at the end, the more the team wins from the prize.

6.title: Will I have fun?
6.value: YES! You will have the best night of your life! Whether old or young, big or small, nerdy or party, you will have fun!

value.8: 01:00am - Resolution of the team fight + speech

cookies.body: This website does not use analytical tracking of any kind. This website uses cookies. These are small text files that the web browser stores on the end device. Cookies help to make the website more user-friendly, effective and secure. Some cookies are "session cookies." Such cookies are deleted by themselves at the end of the browser session. In contrast, other cookies remain on your terminal device until they are manually deleted by yourself. Such cookies help to reuse settings made when returning to the website. With a modern web browser, the setting of cookies can be monitored, restricted or prevented. Many web browsers can be configured to automatically delete cookies when the program is closed. Disabling cookies may result in limited functionality of the website.
cookies.title: Analytics/Cookies/External Resources etc.?

data.body: This website does not collect any data from you. The operator specified in the imprint only learns about you if you write him an e-mail. Thereby the operator learns your e-mail address and your name. This data will only be used to answer your request and will not be passed on to third parties.
data.title: What data is collected by this website?

rights.body: According to DSGVO and BDSG, you can request information, updating, blocking or deletion of all your data at any time. Your contact person for this is the above-mentioned operator of this website. In addition, I am obliged to remind you of your right to object to this consent at any time and, if necessary, to complain to a supervisory authority about me.
rights.title: What are my rights?
